price: 68. Wuxuu Rabbigaa u waxyooday shinnada: Ka sameyso buuraha guryo iyo geedaha iyo waxay dhisaanba.
arabic: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحۡلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِي مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتٗا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعۡرِشُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥā rabbuka ilā al-naḥli ani ittakhidhī mina al-jibāli buyūtan wamina al-shajari wamimmā yaʿrishūna
